title: Drupal security advisory (AV25-255)
description: On May 7, 2025, Drupal published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following:
products: Enterprise MFA - TFA for Drupal  versions prior to 4.7.0 and versions 5.0.0 to versions prior to 5.2.0
Restrict route by IP  versions prior to 1.3.0
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
